item.title: Calendar Based Absence Reporting
item.description:
I have access to a Google Calendar, that contains the absence of all my colleagues as full day events. I work with a mostly remote team, and sometimes it’s useful to know when will my teammates leave for vacation, even if they don’t tell me many days in advance.

I wrote a simple script, to look through the events every monday and filter the ones I’m interested in, then send me an email report.
